mapper.select: SELECT w.*, u.name AS user_name, u.nickname AS user_nickname FROM wallet_table w JOIN user_table u ON w.user_id = u.id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wallet_table VALUES ( wallet_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_Id}, #{bankName}, 0, SYSDATE , #{account_Number})
mapper.update: UPDATE wallet_table SET account_balance = account_balance + #{amount} WHERE bank_name = #{bankName}
